# sourceDomain

**Instance Property**

The source of a web ad.

## Declaration

```swift
var sourceDomain: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

This postback value indicates the `source_domain` of the corresponding [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SKAdNetworkforWebAds/AdImpressionRequest].

## Getting advertisement information

- **adNetworkIdentifier**: A string that represents the advertising network’s unique identifier.
- **appStoreItemIdentifier**: The item identifier of the app that this ad impression advertises.
- **sourceAppStoreItemIdentifier**: The item identifier of the app that displays the ad.
- **sourceIdentifier**: A string that identifies an ad campaign.
